title: Football: the sport of millions
brief_description: Football (soccer) is a peoples sport in the German Republic. Each weekend some 1.5 million spectators attend the games, and there are over 700,000 players in the 64,000 teams. 500,000 of these are juveniles playing in junior teams being trained in special training courses and schools.
